subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Tyler Farrar quit the Tour de France after riding more than a week with a broken left wrist, and Alberto Contador gained 10 seconds on the overall leader, Andy Schleck.
snippet: Tyler Farrar quit the Tour de France after riding more than a week with a broken left wrist, and Alberto Contador gained 10 seconds on the overall leader, Andy Schleck.
